sourceOrganization.name: NIAID ICEMR Network
sourceOrganization.description: The ICEMRS are a global network of independent research centers in malaria-endemic settings, established by NIAID to provide the knowledge, tools, and evidence-based strategies crucial to understanding, controlling, and, ultimately, preventing malaria. For more information, visit the NIAID program page: https://www.niaid.nih.gov/research/excellence-malaria-research
alternateName: International Centers of Excellence for Malaria Research
